description:
Universal calculator is a tool for calculating the user defined arithmetic formulas.
This application just accept the formula and calculate the result based on your inputs.
This app will support all arithmetic formulas like e=M*C*C, c= a+b,Area of a square,  etc. 
Use this app for calculating the your own formula in just $0.99.
This app will allow you to save the formula, so that from next time onwards no need to enter the formula.
You can delete and edit the formula at any point of the time.
There are 8 predefined formulas defined in this app.

Features:-
This app is useful for all. By using this app you can calculate all arithmetic formula.
Easy to use.
